name: SKIRMIKSH
description: The idea is that while transporting a virus - madness, for military use by special forces for more effective battles, a collision with asteroids occurred in the orbit of the target planet. Because of this, the drug was released into the shuttle ventilation system. The survivors, unfortunately or fortunately, have landed on the planet. The choice of what you will do to destroy the planet and go for another, or try to get rid of or synthesize an antidote, the choice is only yours ...
